title: CB}2: Collaborative Natural Language Interaction Research Platform
authors:
Sharf, Jacob  and
Gul, Mustafa Omer  and
Artzi, Yoav
venue: Proceedings of the 61st Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics (Volume 3: System Demonstrations)
abstract: CB2 is a multi-agent platform to study collaborative natural language interaction in a grounded task-oriented scenario. It includes a 3D game environment, a backend server designed to serve trained models to human agents, and various tools and processes to enable scalable studies. We deploy CB2 athttps://cb2.aias a system demonstration with a learned instruction following model.
